def_cn: 玷污，败坏，损害(名誉或形象)
def_en: If you say that something tarnishes someone's reputation or image, you mean that it causes people to have a worse opinion of them than they would otherwise have had.

def_cn: (使)有污迹;(使)失去光泽;(使)变暗淡
def_en: If a metal tarnishes or if something tarnishes it, it becomes stained and loses its brightness.
Tarnish is a substance which forms of the surface of some metals and which stains them or causes them to lose their brightness.
